name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 (Release) A man who claimed to be the former deputy secretary of the Taizhou Municipal Party Committee and the Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission reported by his real name that Ye Zhe and Zhang Jin of the Zhejiang Provincial Supervision Committee tortured him into confession. The man said that during the more than one year of detention, he was unable to receive treatment for his illness, which led to the delayed treatment of his liver cancer.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 31, a netizen disguised as a North Korean sent a group email to the Chinese embassy in the Americas, asking how to apply for a Taiwan visa.
A few days later, the Chinese Embassy in Chile replied: "We can't help you because we are independent of Taiwan."
The Consulate General in Tijuana, Mexico replied that "the embassy only issues Chinese visas. You should inquire about the information at the Taiwan consulate or embassy closest to your place of residence."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/3pBTtCe2cE

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, Xi Jinping announced that China will provide 360 billion yuan in financial support to Africa in the next three years and encourage Africa to issue "Panda Bonds" in China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
For comparison
According to data released by the Ministry of Civil Affairs, in 2023, the country spent a total of 42.17 billion yuan on elderly welfare and 22.32 billion yuan on elderly care services
The amount of money Xi Jinping will send to Africa each year in the next three years is about twice this amount.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yangcheng Evening News on September 3

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Liaocheng, Shandong. Netizens posted a video saying that the union post had a password lock installed, so many outdoor workers could only lie on the roadside to take a nap. The street office said: The post was established to serve union members, and it is currently being rectified overnight.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 3, Zhengzhou, Henan. Netizens said that a kindergarten in Zhengzhou was extremely difficult to recruit students, so it decided to reward parents 800 yuan for helping the school recruit a student from September 4.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yangcheng Evening News on September 4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the research institute "big data china" released a set of changing indicators that tracked 20 years of statistics: Why are Chinese poor/rich? In the first picture, in 2004, the top three reasons for poverty that Chinese people believed were: lack of ability, insufficient education, and lack of effort. In 2024, they became: unequal opportunities, insufficient education, and unfair system.
In the second picture, the top three reasons that Chinese people believed were the reasons for wealth in 2004 were: ability and talent, higher education, and connections, and in 2024, they became: connections, rich second generation, and better opportunities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 4, Linyi, Shandong. Liang, secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Berlin Town, Pingyi County, was exposed online for driving under the influence of alcohol, closing the car windows, covering his face with his hands, and refusing to cooperate with the traffic police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, several Chinese media reported that several real estate agencies in Beijing released videos saying that Musk bought a house in Beijing at No. 8 Xiaoyun Road, Beijing for $150 million. It is reported that the unit price of the project starts at 360,000 yuan and the highest is 500,000 yuan per square meter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In response, Tesla responded to Sina Auto and said, "This is fake news, pure hype, and there is no bottom line for hype."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 3, People's Daily Online published a video titled "If there is a war, we must recall the vehicles." A large number of netizens taunted the video with comments like "If there is a war, we must recall Land Rover." As of this writing, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As the school season begins, schools in many cities are so hot that they have to move ice cubes to cool down because there is no air conditioning in the classrooms. Some teachers and students are soaked in sweat. In response, the education department said: cultivate students' spirit of hard work and perseverance. However, just over a month ago, many netizens accused France of being stingy and saying that there was no air conditioning in the Olympics.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, a blogger asked ChatGPT, "Which country has occupied the most Chinese territory?" ChatGPT replied, "It is China's good friend Russia." In response, some netizens accused the blogger of being a spy and deliberately provoking relations between China and Russia.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 1, Xinhua News Agency: China-Africa cooperation enriches the "food bag" and "money bag" of the African people

On September 5, Xi Jinping announced that China's bilateral relations with all African countries with diplomatic ties have been elevated to the strategic level

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man posted a video saying that he left his homeland and family to join the Russian army in order to fight against "European and American fascism". He said, "The main reason for coming here is that Russia has fallen, and the next one will be China."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Washington Post: How China Extends Repression to American Cities
According to a six-month investigative report recently released by The Washington Post, during Xi Jinping's visit to San Francisco for the APEC summit in November 2023, the Chinese government and its supporters organized a series of activities on American soil in an attempt to suppress dissenting voices, seriously infringing on the right to freedom of speech protected by the First Amendment of the U.S. Constitution.

The investigation is based on the analysis of more than 2,000 photos and videos, and interviews with more than 35 witnesses, U.S. officials and analysts. The report found that the Chinese Consulate in the United States was directly involved in organizing and financing support activities, including paying for hotels and meals for supporters. At least 35 pro-CCP Chinese groups came from all over the United States to participate.

Multiple violent incidents have been recorded, mainly initiated by pro-CCP activists against protesters against Xi Jinping. The most serious acts of violence were carried out by a coordinated group of...
fullContent:
《华盛顿邮报》：中国如何将镇压扩展到美国城市
据《华盛顿邮报》近日发布的一项为期六个月的调查报告显示，在2023年11月习近平访问旧金山参加APEC峰会期间，中国政府及其支持者在美国土地上组织了一系列活动，试图压制异议声音，严重侵犯了美国宪法第一修正案保护的言论自由权。

调查基于对2000多张照片和视频的分析，以及35多名目击者、美国官员和分析人士的采访。报告发现，中国驻美领事馆直接参与组织和资助支持活动，包括为支持者支付酒店和餐费。至少35个亲中共华人团体从美国各地赶来参加。

多起暴力事件被记录在案，主要由亲中共活动分子发起，针对反对习近平的抗议者。其中最严重的暴力行为是由协调一致的一群年轻男子实施的。视频证据显示，中国外交官出现在抗议现场并与激进分子互动。

美国官员将这些行为视为中国"跨国镇压"的例证。国务院发言人表示，已就这些暴力和恐吓行为直接向中国政府提出关切。FBI目前正在调查这些暴力事件。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 (released) Shanghai (released IP). The woman refused to be checked at the airport and took out the Chinese flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 5, the Chinese national football team will play its first World Cup qualifier against Japan tonight, but CCTV-5 has no plans to broadcast it live. On that day, a man in a military uniform from the last century held a megaphone to cheer for Chinese fans, "The Central Propaganda Department said three things: I don't believe there is a task that cannot be completed, I don't believe there is a difficulty that cannot be overcome, and I don't believe there is an enemy that cannot be eliminated!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest news is that the Chinese national football team's record of losing to Japan has hit a new high. In history, the Chinese national football team has lost to Japan by a maximum of 2 goals. Now they are trailing 0-4 in 57 minutes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest news is that the score is now 6-0

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The latest news is that the Chinese team was defeated by the Japanese team 0:7, setting a record for the biggest score difference in the history of the two teams' confrontation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Taiyuan, Shanxi, it was revealed online that the organizer of the agricultural machinery and fertilizer pesticide exhibition held at the Xiaohe International Convention and Exhibition Center hired some elderly people to pretend to be buyers. Because the organizer only gave them a steamed bun for lunch, the elderly people were dissatisfied and exposed. So the exhibitors collectively went to the organizer to protect their rights and demanded a refund.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV responded to not broadcasting the Chinese national football team's top 18 match: After repeated efforts, the other party's offer was extremely high. The Central Radio and Television Station firmly resisted the behavior of domestic and foreign capital disrupting the sports copyright market. In response to this, netizens said, "No one will watch it even if it is broadcasted." "CCTV is wise not to broadcast it, avoiding a night of grief and anger for tens of millions of Chinese people."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Zhaotong, Yunnan. A group of middle-aged women formed a group to dance on the steps of the Red Army Martyrs Memorial Tomb. In response, the staff said: We discourage people from doing this at the open cemetery every day, but we cannot completely solve the problem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 4, a video titled "My father is a founding general" sparked heated discussion. Netizens responded, "My father is a founding farmer, the farmer who raised your father."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Sichuan. Netizens saw a family of three sleeping in a corner outside the hospital, so they took a photo of them and placed the photo and red envelopes next to them. After waking up, the family hugged each other and cried with emotion. In response, many netizens also posted photos of themselves or their family members fighting cancer in the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Gansu. Gansu Bajian Group owed workers wages, and the workers begged at the company: I need to see a doctor, please be kind, leaders! I kowtow to you! Please have mercy! Give me my wages!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Beijing, several interception officers tried to drag petitioners into a car on the roadside. A kind-hearted woman stepped forward to stop them. One of the interception officers fled in panic after seeing the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Positive energy bloggers" Gu Yan Mu Chan and Di Gu Xiong Lao Liu also wrote articles criticizing the Chinese national football team.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 (Release), Jingbian County, Shaanxi. Three children said in front of the camera that their father was drowned at the construction site and their mother was detained by the Jingbian County government. Currently, the three siblings cannot go to school and have no home. "I can only wait for my mother to come home at the gate of the county government every day."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5 news. The Chinese government adjusted its policy on international adoptions. With the exception of foreigners adopting children of collateral relatives within three generations and stepchildren, no more children will be sent abroad for adoption.
